climbs.name: Minor Detour
climbs.fa: Don Wilson and Karen Wilson, November 1987

content.description:
Scramble over rough terrain and up slabs to the base, or better yet climb Mighty Mouse first. Locate the thin crack in a right-facing corner and before you know it you're on top.

Short but fun with good rock; the rappel anchor could use an upgrade.
content.protection: Gear to 1 inch, 1 bolt (1/4") anchor/rap from the top
content.location: You'll find this route on the north face of a large block about mid-height and right of center on the west face of the formation.

climbs.name: Mighty Mouse
climbs.fa: Don Wilson and Karen Wilson, November 1987

content.description:
Climb a crack which dies out partway and then continue up on good holds past two bolts.

The rock quality is good on this route and on the walk off don't miss the nearby

Minor Detour

.
content.location: Located on the slabby west face and just left of a prominent wide crack.
